title: Bug 9654: Modify Parameters: Dialog details
description: Bug 9654: Modify Parameters: The dialog details show duplicated name validation on the first page. The first and second columns should be merged.
OB: a. The buttons are too small. b. When the dialog comes up, no table entry is selected. However, both move buttons are enabled. e. When changing a parameter name to something very long, the preview is cut-off. g. The dialog comes up huge for methods with many parameters.
EB: a. The marking between the button and list is too large. The top button should be aligned with the dialog top. c. The table should have a label so it can contain a mnemonic. d. Multiple selection should be allowed, as move up/down can be applied on more than one item. f. The signature preview must be a label that wraps. It would be nice if the signature preview has the background color set to the same color as a hover. h.
SR: 1. Open the Modify Parameters dialog. 2. Observe the size of the buttons. 3. Note that no table entry is initially selected. 4. Try changing a parameter name to something very long. 5. Verify the preview is properly displayed without being cut-off. 6. Test the dialog with methods that have many parameters. 7. Check the alignment of the top button with the dialog top. 8. Test the table with a mnemonic. 9. Try selecting multiple items in the table. 10. Apply move up/down on multiple selected items. 11. Verify the signature preview is a label that wraps. 12. Check the background color of the signature preview.
